work: Optimized ServiceNow workflows to develop management and strategic portfolio dashboards for four prominent companies. The solutions were specifically tailored to be used by HR personnel, employees, and customers.

Supervised the quality of Chinese-English translations for ServiceNow portals by translating an average of 200 cells of notifications per day, ensuring high-quality cross-cultural organizational communications.
Compiled meeting minutes involving at least four parties, summarizing and translating key action points and business agreements between five stakeholders engaged in our client’s project.
Attained the Venture Scout Award (VSA) and Chief Scout Award across at least 10 years of scouting.
Leading and coordinating diverse scouting activities for groups of 20 to 40 youths every week.
Mentored and guided over three generations of scout troops, optimizing and facilitating effective leadership councils.
Cultivated our youths’ interest in their scouting journey and maintained an 80% retention rate of scouts per generation.
Established the first committee in McDonald's HK operated entirely by passionate Hong Kong youth.
Partnered with local Hong Kong artists to organize the "Coach McNugget Art World" Exhibition, showcasing over 20 meticulously curated nugget-themed artworks for McDonald's HK's 40 years of McNuggets.
Supported the CEO Randy Lai and other board members as a key decision-maker and consultant for McDonald's HK youth-related business decisions.

experienceProject.project: HKUST Corporate Consulting Project Sponsored by JPMorgan Chase & Co
work: Designed a Global ETF Sales Dashboard to aggregate trends from news and social media, progressing JP Morgan’s competitive edge in the ETF trading landscape. Achieved 1st place in the competition.

experienceProject.position: Fixed Income Student Analyst / Full-stack Developer
work: Applied machine learning algorithms to data sourced from Eikon Terminal and Yahoo Finance, leading a team to develop a predictive dashboard for corporate sponsors. The dashboard operates on Next.js and Google Cloud Platform to accurately predict changes in bond pricing, achieving 2nd place in the competition.
Identified and utilized 62 features used to predict yearly credit rating migrations with 79.71% back-tested accuracy.
Developed a yearly credit spread prediction model with an average error of 76.14 basis points.
Engaged with prominent Hong Kong CEOs and business leaders to participate in social empowerment initiatives.
